page.title: 07AMENITIES
page.content: Each village has its own small village hall for use by local organisations and maintained by village hall committees, groups of individuals dedicated to raising funds for this purpose. The WI group meets monthly at Tarrant Gunville, holds flower and produce shows, a Harvest Supper open to all, organises carol singing and produces an excellent annual pantomime, written and produced by one of its members. The Bugle Horn at Tarrant Gunville provides the only other meeting place and extends its function as 'watering hole' to organise a bonfire party and other small events during the year to which all are welcome.
